message.raw: Fix real-Fourier interpolation to require subsequent axes to be in grid space, so that the symmetry required to compute the interpolant is local.  Fixes bug on interpolation along first Fourier axis of real domains with multiple Fourier bases.
message.html: Fix real-Fourier interpolation to require subsequent axes to be in grid space, so that the symmetry required to compute the interpolant is local. Fixes bug on interpolation along first Fourier axis of real domains with multiple Fourier bases.
